thoughts.text: I think I should execute a shell command to list the processes that are currently running on the system.
thoughts.reasoning: Executing a shell command to list the processes that are currently running on the system will allow me to identify any processes that may be interfering with my code or causing performance issues.
thoughts.plan:
- Execute a shell command to list the processes that are currently running on the system
- Identify any processes that may be interfering with my code or causing performance issues
- Implement any changes that I think will be beneficial
thoughts.criticism: I need to make sure that I am not relying too heavily on the process list and that I am still using my own judgement to determine which processes may be causing issues.
thoughts.speak: I think I should execute a shell command to list the processes that are currently running on the system.
